shelfButtonInfos.label: for skin in pm.ls(ty...malizeWeights.set(1)
shelfButtonInfos.annotation: Set interactive mode for skin clusters.

shelfButtonInfos.label: for jnt in pm.select...ompensate.set(False)
shelfButtonInfos.annotation: Set segmentScaleCompensate to false for selected skin clusters.

shelfButtonInfos.label: for node in pm.ls(ty...olorSpace.set('Raw')
shelfButtonInfos.annotation: Set color space to raw for normal maps.

shelfButtonInfos.label: for mesh in pm.ls(ty....tangentSpace.set(2)
shelfButtonInfos.annotation: Set tangentSpace to Left Handed for meshes.
